REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactBase, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Creates a new contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactModel) – The data for the contact to create.

  • user (User) – The user to create the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The newly created contact.

Return type:

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Retrieves a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The contact with the specified ID, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Note | None

async src.repository.contacts.remove_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Removes a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to remove.

  • user (User) – The user to remove the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The removed contact, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.search_contacts(credentials: str, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Searches a single contact with the specified credentials for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • credentials (int) – Credentilas of the contact to search.

  • user (User) – The user to search the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The searched contact, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.show_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.upcoming_birthday(user: User, db: Session)¶

Searches contacts with the upcoming birthdays in the future 7 days from current date.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user to search the birthdays for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The list of contacts, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

result | None

async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdate, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Updates a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to update.

  • body (ContactUpdate) – The updated data for the contact.

  • user (User) – The user to update the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The updated contact, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

REST API routes Contacts¶

async src.routes.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactBase, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

The route is intended for creating a contact

Parameters:

  • current_user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

Creates a contact through repository_contacts

Return type:

contact

async src.routes.contacts.read_contact(contact_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

The route is intended for receiving a contact by id

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – Id of the contact

  • current_user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A single contact

contact

async src.routes.contacts.search_contacts(credentials: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

The route is intended for search of a contact by credentials

Parameters:

  • credentials (int) – credentials of a contact

  • current_user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

Returns a searched contact

Return type:

contact

async src.routes.contacts.show_contacts(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

The route is intended for receiving a list of contacts

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • current_user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.routes.contacts.upcoming_birthday(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Parameters:

  • current_user (User.) – The user to retrieve contacts for

  • db (Session.) – The database session

Returns:

contact.

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – BackgroundTasks.

  • request (Request) – Request.
